20-1055.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes for the Transportation and Infrastructure Committee meeting held Tuesday, December 4, 2018.Page 1 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMWEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 11, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHTRANSPORTATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE COMMITTEE MINUTESA motion was made by Member Pearce, seconded by Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Pearce and SupernawAbsent: 1 - Uranga2.

20-1056.summary: Recommendation to receive a report on Public Work's role in 5G site location selection.Eric Lopez, Director of Public Works, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Supernaw spoke.Erin Weesner-McKinley, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.Chair Supernaw spoke.Eric Lopez, Director of Public Works, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Supernaw and Eric Lopez, Director of Public Works.Jeffrey Melching, Rutan & Tucker, LLP, spoke.Chair Supernaw spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Supernaw and Jeffrey Melching, Rutan & Tucker, LLP.Eric Lopez, Director of Public Works, spoke.Councilmember Pearce spoke.Chair Supernaw spoke.A motion was made by Member Pearce, seconded by Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 1:00 PMWEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 11, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHTRANSPORTATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE COMMITTEE MINUTESYes: 2 - Pearce and SupernawAbsent: 1 - Uranga3.

20-1057.summary: Recommendation to receive a report on Public Work's complaint review process on ADA Ramp location selection. Alvin Papa, City Engineer, spoke; and provided a PowerPoint presentation.Chair Supernaw spoke.Eric Lopez, Director of Public Works, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Supernaw and Eric Lopez, Director of Public Works.A motion was made by Member Pearce, seconded by Chair Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 2 - Pearce and SupernawAbsent: 1 - Uranga4.
